fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY 6M CAD
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR TermLabel = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL]
VAR MarketSubtype = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Market Subtype]
VAR RiskDays = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days]
RETURN
IF(
    TermLabel = "4 Month" ||
    TermLabel = "4 Month Swap" ||
    TermLabel = "5 Month" ||
    TermLabel = "6 Month Swap" ||
    TermLabel = "6 Month" ||
    TermLabel = "6 Month Swap" ||
    (MarketSubtype = "Major Curve" && RiskDays > 91 && RiskDays <= 183),
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T CAD] + 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Fix Value T],
    0
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF with OR conditions to a DAX calculated column. All field references were mapped to 'TableName'[ColumnName]. The expression is row-level (no aggregations or parameters), so it is implemented as a calculated column.
